鍵開け道具: (かぎあけどうぐ) - lock pick; lock-opening tools
鍼: (しん) - Agulha, agulha de acupuntura; acupuntura
鍼灸師: (しんきゅうし) - acupuncturist and practitioner of moxibustion
鍼灸院: (しんきゅういん) - acupuncture and moxibustion clinic
鍾き: (しょうき) - Shoki the Plague-Queller/Zhong Kui (traditional Chinese deity said to prevent plagues and ward off evil beings)/vanquisher of ghosts and evil beings, and reputedly able to command 80,000 demons; Shoki (WWII fighter aircraft)
鍾乳洞: (しょうにゅうどう) - limestone cave; limestone cavern; limestone grotto
鍾馗: (しょうき) - Shoki the Plague-Queller/Zhong Kui (traditional Chinese deity said to prevent plagues and ward off evil beings)/vanquisher of ghosts and evil beings, and reputedly able to command 80,000 demons; Shoki (WWII fighter aircraft)
鍾馗さん: (しょうきさん) - small statue of Shoki the Plague-Queller (placed on the overhang of traditional houses)
鍾馗散: (しょうきさん) - traditional Chinese cold remedy (a medical powder with antipyretic and diaphoretic effects)
鍾馗水仙: (ショウキズイセン) - Lycoris traubii (species of spider lily)
鍾馗蘭: (ショウキラン) - Yoania japonica (species of orchid); Lycoris traubii (species of spider lily)
鎌: (kama) - foice, foice; parte de um peixe ao redor das guelras
鎌をかける: (かまをかける) - to trick someone (into confirming or revealing the truth); to ask a leading question
鎌を掛ける: (かまをかける) - to trick someone (into confirming or revealing the truth); to ask a leading question
鎌倉五山: (かまくらござん) - the five great Rinzai temples of Kamakura (Kencho-ji, Engaku-ji, Jufuku-ji, Jochi-ji, Jomyo-ji)
鎌倉幕府: (かまくらばくふ) - Kamakura shogunate (1185-1333 CE)
鎌倉彫り: (かまくらぼり) - carvings of the Kamakura style
鎌倉新仏教: (かまくらしんぶっきょう) - new schools of Japanese Buddhism founded during the Kamakura period
鎌倉時代: (かまくらじだい) - Kamakura period (1185-1333 CE)
鎌切: (カマキリ) - (occ. written 杜父魚) praying mantis (esp. the narrow-winged mantis, Tenodera angustipennis)
鎌宝蔵院流: (かまほうぞういんりゅう) - Hozoin-ryu (school of sojutsu)
鎌形赤血球貧血症: (かまがたせっけっきゅうひんけつしょう) - sickle cell anemia (anaemia); sickle cell disease
鎌柄: (カマツカ) - sickle handle; goby minnow (Pseudogobio esocinus); Oriental photinia (species of shrub, Photinia villosa); Asiatic dayflower (Commelina communis); Joseph's-coat (species of amaranth, Amaranthus tricolor)
鎌槍: (かまやり) - spear with curved cross-blades
鎌止め: (かまどめ) - cutting grass and trees is prohibited
鎌海豚: (カマイルカ) - Pacific white-sided dolphin (Lagenorhynchus obliquidens)
鎌状赤血球病: (かまじょうせっけっきゅう) - sickle cell anemia (anaemia); sickle cell disease
鎌状赤血球症: (かまじょうせっけっきゅうしょう) - sickle cell disease; sickle cell anemia (anaemia)
鎌状赤血球貧血: (かまじょうせっけっきゅうひんけつ) - sickle cell anemia (anaemia); sickle cell disease
鎌継: (かまつぎ) - gooseneck tenon and mortise joint
鎌継ぎ: (かまつぎ) - gooseneck tenon and mortise joint
鎌脚虫: (カマアシムシ) - proturan (any wingless insect of order Protura)
鎌足: (かまあし) - legs bowed in; sitting with heels spread apart
鎌足虫目: (かまあしむしもく) - Protura (order of wingless insects)
鎌首: (かまくび) - sickle-shaped neck (e.g. snake, praying mantis); crooked neck; gooseneck
鎌首をもたげる: (かまくびをもたげる) - to raise one's head (esp. of a snake)
鎌髭: (かまひげ) - sickle-shaped moustache (often worn by servants in the Edo period)
鎌鼬: (かまいたち) - type Japanese folkloric monster (yokai), thought to be a trio of weasels who appear in a whirlwind to cut their victim; cut caused by whirlwind
鎔かす: (わかす) - (沸かす only) to boil/to heat; (沸かす only) to excite; to melt (metal)
鎔く: (とく) - to dissolve (paint); to scramble (eggs); to melt (metal, etc.); to mix (water with flour, etc.)
鎔ける: (とける) - (解ける is sometimes used also) to melt; to thaw; to fuse; to dissolve
鎔解: (ようかい) - (溶解 only) dissolution/dissolving/solution (e.g. chemical); melting/liquefying/fusion
鎔鉱炉: (ようこうろ) - smelting furnace; blast furnace
鎖かたびら: (くさりかたびら) - chain mail (armor, armour)
鎖す: (さす) - to shut/to close/to lock/to fasten; (とざす only) to plunge (in grief)
鎖国: (さこく) - national isolation; exclusion of foreigners
鎖国主義: (さこくしゅぎ) - (national) isolationism; isolation policy
鎖国政策: (さこくせいさく) - (national) isolationism; isolation policy
鎖帷子: (くさりかたびら) - chain mail (armor, armour)
鎖式化合物: (さしきかごうぶつ) - chain compound; open chain compound
鎖樋: (くさりどい) - rain chain (hanging from a gutter and functioning as downspout, often made of ornamental cups)
鎖蛇: (クサリヘビ) - viper (esp. a pitless viper)
鎖骨下動脈: (さこつかどうみゃく) - subclavian artery
鎧う: (よろう) - to put on armour (armor)/to wear armour/to arm oneself; to wear/to cover
鎧一具: (よろいいちぐ) - suit of armor; suit of armour
鎧土竜蜚蠊: (ヨロイモグラゴキブリ) - giant burrowing cockroach (Macropanesthia rhinoceros)
鎧戸: (よろいど) - slatted shutter; louver door (window)
鎧板: (よろいいた) - slat; spline; louver; louvre
鎧櫃: (よろいびつ) - storage chest for a suit of armour and a helmet
鎧竜: (がいりゅう) - ankylosaur (any dinosaur of infraorder Ankylosauria)
鎧草: (ヨロイグサ) - Angelica dahurica (species of angelica)
鎧袖一触: (がいしゅういっしょく) - (yoji) (beating someone) hands down; with a single blow
